div.ab: that she does not want to come. But, if she comes and he sees her, so should he answer her: "Madame, be welcome". After that he must call/conjure her (?), so that she must send two of her servants so that they must bring her a stool that she would like to sit upon, and he must call/conjure her like so: "Madame, I conjure [you] on the part of God and on the part of all the names of God, and by Alpha Adah, who is the refined(?) prince of all that is good(?), who (???) command through you, of your servants, to carry passage(?), and (???) conjures on the part of God and on the part of all the names of God and Alpha Adah who is the refined(?) prince of all that is good(?)". that is the incantation. Then, she sends one of her two that come with her to come back to her and bring her a stool. So she sits
